publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4527 Scott Barrie: Congratulations to Kelburn Brewery on Cart Blanche, Champion Beer of Scotland—That the Parliament, occupying the site of a former brewery, notes the importance of beer to the Scottish economy and particularly recognises the value of microbrewers to their local area; welcomes the Campaign for Real Ale’s 4th Scottish Traditional Beer Festival back to Edinburgh, and congratulates the Kelburn Brewery of Barrhead on producing Cart Blanche, the Champion Beer of Scotland. R Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh*

S2M-4527 Scott Barrie: Congratulations to Kelburn Brewery on Cart Blanche, Champion Beer of Scotland—That the Parliament, occupying the site of a former brewery, notes the importance of beer to the Scottish economy and particularly recognises the value of microbrewers to their local area; welcomes the Campaign for Real Ale’s 4th Scottish Traditional Beer Festival back to Edinburgh, and congratulates the Kelburn Brewery of Barrhead on producing Cart Blanche, the Champion Beer of Scotland. R Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Christine May*, Patrick Harvie*, Sarah Boyack*

S2M-4527 Congratulations to Kelburn Brewery on Cart Blanche, Champion Beer of Scotland (lodged on 8 June 2006) Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Murray Tosh*, Maureen Macmillan*, Helen Eadie*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-4527 Congratulations to Kelburn Brewery on Cart Blanche, Champion Beer of Scotland (lodged on 8 June 2006) Cathie Craigie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Nora Radcliffe*, Robin Harper*
S2M-4527 Congratulations to Kelburn Brewery on Cart Blanche, Champion Beer of Scotland (lodged on 8 June 2006) Dave Petrie*
